00032 #define         S_ISDIR(m)   (((m) & S_IFMT) == S_IFDIR)

00038 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00039 using namespace std;
00040 
00041 static string LockFileExtension = ".lock";
00042 
00043 /*
00044  * Check the existance of the file.
00045  */
00046 bool FileUtils::Exists(const char *fileName)
00047 {
00051         struct stat st;
00052         return (stat(fileName, &st) == 0);
00053 }
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * Delete the input file.
00057  */
00058 bool FileUtils::RemoveFile(const char *fileName)
00059 {
00060         return (remove(fileName) == 0);
00061 }
00062 
00063 /*
00064  * Check if either the file or the lock file exists.
00065  * Return false the file does not exist of if the lock file does exist.
00066  * Otherwise create the lock file and return the status of the creation.
00067  */
00068 bool FileUtils::LockFile(const char *fileName)
00069 {
00070         if (FileUtils::Exists(fileName) == false)
00071                 return false;
00072 
00073         string lockFile = fileName + LockFileExtension;
00074         if (FileUtils::Exists(lockFile.c_str()) == true)
00075                 return false;
00076 
00077         ofstream fileStream;
00078         fileStream.open(lockFile.c_str(), ios::out);
00079         bool isOpen = fileStream.is_open();
00080         fileStream.close();
00081         return isOpen;
00082 }
00083 
00084 /*
00085  * If the lock file does not exist then return a false.
00086  * Otherwise remove the lock file and return the status.
00087  */
00088 bool FileUtils::UnlockFile(const char *fileName)
00089 {
00090         string lockFile = fileName + LockFileExtension;
00091         if (FileUtils::Exists(lockFile.c_str()) == false)
00092                 return true;
00093         return (remove(lockFile.c_str()) == 0);
00094 }
00095 
00096 list<string> FileUtils::ListFiles(const char *pathName, const char *ext)
00097 {
00098         list<string> files;
00099         string basePath = pathName;
00100         if (basePath.length() > 0)
00101         {
00102                 if (basePath[basePath.length()-1] != '\\' && basePath[basePath.length()-1] != '/')
00103                 {
00104                         basePath += "/";
00105                 }
00106         }
00107         string exten = ext;
00108 
00109 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00110 
00111         WIN32_FIND_DATA findData;
00112         string search = basePath + "*.";
00113         if (exten.length() == 0)
00114                 search += "*";
00115         else
00116                 search += exten;
00117         HANDLE hHandle = FindFirstFile(search.c_str(), &findData);
00118         BOOL bFound = (hHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE);
00119         while (bFound)
00120         {
00121                 if (!(findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTORY))
00122                 {
00123                         string file = basePath + findData.cFileName;
00124                         files.push_back(file);
00125                 }
00126 
00127                 // Find the next file.
00128                 bFound = ::FindNextFile(hHandle, &findData);
00129         }
00130         ::FindClose(hHandle);
00131 
00132 #else
00133 
00134         struct stat st;
00135         DIR *dirp = opendir(pathName);
00136         struct dirent *dp;
00137         bool cont = (dirp != NULL);
00138         while (cont)
00139         {
00140                 dp = readdir(dirp);
00141                 if (dp)
00142                 {
00143                         string file = basePath + dp->d_name;
00144                         stat(file.c_str(), &st);
00145                         if ((st.st_mode & S_IFDIR) != S_IFDIR)
00146                         {
00147                                 if (exten.length() == 0)
00148                                 {
00149                                         files.push_back(file);
00150                                 }
00151                                 else
00152                                 {
00153                                         if (file.rfind(ext) == file.length()-exten.length())
00154                                         {
00155                                                 files.push_back(file);
00156                                         }
00157                                 }
00158                         }
00159                 }
00160                 cont = (dp != NULL && dirp != NULL);
00161         }
00162         if (dirp)
00163                 closedir(dirp);
00164 
00165 #endif
00166 
00167         return files;
00168 }

00170 /* Deletes a file. */
00171 void FileUtils::RemovePath(const char *path)
00172 {
00173         list<string> files;
00174         string basePath = path;
00175         if (basePath.length() > 0)
00176         {
00177                 if (basePath[basePath.length()-1] != '\\' && basePath[basePath.length()-1] != '/')
00178                 {
00179                         basePath += "/";
00180                 }
00181         }
00182 
00183 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00184 
00185         WIN32_FIND_DATA findData;
00186         string search = basePath + "*.*";
00187         HANDLE hHandle = FindFirstFile(search.c_str(), &findData);
00188         BOOL bFound = (hHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE);
00189         while (bFound)
00190         {
00191                 string fileName = findData.cFileName;
00192                 if (fileName != "." && fileName != "..")
00193                 {
00194                         string filePath = basePath + findData.cFileName;
00195                         if (!(findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTORY))
00196                         {
00197                                 FileUtils::RemoveFile(filePath.c_str());
00198                         }
00199                         else
00200                         {
00201                                 FileUtils::RemovePath(filePath.c_str());
00202                         }
00203                 }
00204 
00205                 // Find the next file.
00206                 bFound = ::FindNextFile(hHandle, &findData);
00207         }
00208         ::FindClose(hHandle);
00209         _rmdir(path);
00210 
00211 #else
00212 
00213         struct stat st;
00214         DIR *dirp = opendir(path);
00215         struct dirent *dp;
00216         bool cont = (dirp != NULL);
00217         while (cont)
00218         {
00219                 dp = readdir(dirp);
00220                 if (dp)
00221                 {
00222                         string fileName = dp->d_name;
00223                         if (fileName != "." && fileName != "..")
00224                         {
00225                                 string filePath = basePath + dp->d_name;
00226                                 stat(filePath.c_str(), &st);
00227                                 if ((st.st_mode & S_IFDIR) != S_IFDIR)
00228                                 {
00229                                         FileUtils::RemoveFile(filePath.c_str());
00230                                 }
00231                                 else
00232                                 {
00233                                         FileUtils::RemovePath(filePath.c_str());
00234                                 }
00235                         }
00236                 }
00237                 cont = (dp != NULL && dirp != NULL);
00238         }
00239         if (dirp)
00240                 closedir(dirp);
00241         rmdir(path);
00242 
00243 #endif
00244 
00245 }
